Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory of Kassandra | the [[In Dreams... | genetic memory]] of Eivor Varinsdottir

Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'According to Lyra, she was no murderer. Word had spread that she was the killer of an innocent family, and even when she proclaimed her innocence, Kassandra knew that there were always two sides to one story.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.location: Polyorophos Gardens, Oikos of Atlantis, Atlantis

General_Description: '''In Dreams''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found a [[Lyra|woman]] accused of being a murderer and who was about to get killed by two people.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra investigated the murder and either accused Lyra or not. Lyra was later revealed to be a werewolf and either committed suicide or received help.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
